DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , single-blind , control , multi-center study subject undergo DFU treatment . Qualified subject randomize ( 1:1 ) ; test group ( Eclipse PRP™ Wound Biomatrix ) control group ( usual customary practice ) . The study consist 3 period : screening period , active treatment period , follow-up period ( heal ) . Approximately 250 subject enrol . Subjects ≥18 year age chronic Wagner grade 1 2 DFU ( great 1 month duration ) . Each subject enrol active treatment period 12 week , closure wind confirmatory visit 2 week wound closure , whether closure occur 12 week earlier .
